item_category: A sophisticated design and powerful hardware for effective multitasking, this compact 8 litre chassis is the ideal size for fitting under or on top of a desk. Powered by an AMD Ryzen 3 processor move through tasks easily as they arise. With 1TB of HDD storage you'll be able to store more of your favourite media and programmes.
review_title: Perfect for the job I need it for
review_text:
Very fast delivery. Perfectly packaged. Easy set up, up and running in about 1/2hr.
Very quiet, nice size.  Only thing to critize is the disk drawer, slightly flimsy, but wont be used much.  Over all very good
